description: Erection of single storey rear extension (Maximum 5.80m in depth, maximum height of 3.81m and eaves height of 3.07m)
decision_conditions: The height of the eaves of the proposed single storey rear extension would exceed 3m in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (i), of Class A, part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The proposal includes provision of a raised patio area in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (k)(i), of Class A, part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

It has not been demonstrated that the materials used in any exterior work of the proposed development would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse, in conflict with Condition A.3 (a) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
